summary: Lifelong friends Deco and Naldinho, who own a small steaming boat in Bahia, meet strip-dancer Karinna. Both men fall for her and their friendship is deeply shattered.
cast: Lázaro Ramos|Wagner Moura|Alice Braga|Maria Menezes|Joao Miguel Leonelli|Débora Santiago|Hugo Rodas|Divina Valéria|Dois Mundos|Gerónimo|Fernando Fulco|David Herman|Olga Machado|Fernanda de Freitas|Ricardo Luedy|Leno Sacramento|Wilson Mello|Zeca Abreu|Nonato Freire|Ricardo Spencer|Adelena Rios|Taís Wagner|Caroline Ribeiro|Andréia Elia|Marcos Pedroso|Alessandra|Guiga Scott|Agnaldo Lopes|Rai Alves|Tinho Bahia|Luís Olho de Gato|Carlos Pronzato|Felipe Ferreira
title: Cidade Baixa
